title: WOODACRE APARTMENTS 1 BEDROOM
posting_body: The unit is over 740 square feet on the first floor, and have nice size front patio and back patio.
Each unit has laminate/carpets, fresh paint, ceiling fans, refrigerator, dishwasher, Microwave, and  oven.
There is plenty of storage space with wall-to-wall closets in the bedroom.
We are a garden style apartment complex on almost 4 acres of land!
This complex is very spacious and quiet.
It has tall trees in a beautiful garden setting.
We are located in the center of Silicon Valley on the Sunnyvale/Mountain View border, less than 2 miles from highway 85 and 1 mile from El Camino Real.
The location allows convenient access to highways 237, 101, and central expressway.
There is a gym, pool, hot tub, and on-site laundry.
Tenants pay for all utilities, each unit has assigned covered parking.
